get.summary: Returns properties based on their assessed value.
get.description: Get a list of assessment snapshots that fall within a specific GeoID that were assessed at some value range between specified calendar dates.

parameters.name: geoid
parameters.description: A list of geographies that this property belongs to. These geoIDs are used by search engine and values should not be exposed to the public.

parameters.name: startcalendardate
parameters.description: The standardized date for search purposes

parameters.name: endcalendardate
parameters.description: The standardized date for search purposes

parameters.name: minassdttlvalue
parameters.description: The total assessed value from the local taxing authority

parameters.name: maxassdttlvalue
parameters.description: The total assessed value from the local taxing authority

200.description: list assessment snapshots for a specific GeoID

get.description: Get a full detail of property characteristics and assessment information for a specific property.

parameters.name: address1
parameters.description: The first line of the property address

parameters.name: address2
parameters.description: The second line of the property address

200.description: list of full detail record and assessment details for a specific address
